list.title: INFORMATION SYSTEMS ENGINEERING INTERN
description: Worked on the back-end developers team
Web-scraping scripts were made with NodeJS and SlimerJS
Trie-Search algorithm was applied to find institution and organizations in articles, compatible with Turkish language
Used Zemberek-NLP to finding Turkish root words.

list.title: INFORMATION SYSTEMS ENGINEERING INTERN
description: Worked on the front-end developers team in primarily Javascript,HTML and CSS to plan, design and develop the full front-end implementation of a new website..
Old websites reviewed and made decision for transferring all datas to wordpress content management system.
Finally all code was perfected and pushed to production.

list.title: FULL-STACK WEB DEVELOPER
description: Since 2012, made a lot of works on web.
Also, used wordpress as content management systems, developed a lot plugin and themes.
Many bugs fixed, and desired things were made on web for customer.
Currently helping for needy developers on forums and other areas.
